resources.string: Anxiety is a condition often described as a person having a feeling of uneasiness and apprehension towards particular stimuli, combined with symptoms of panic.

Anxiety can often appear to a person through stress, increased heart rate, irritability, or breathing problems. If you experience problems with anxiety it may be recommended to speak to a psychiatrist or psychologist to discuss your issues.
You can read more about anxiety here:
Depression is a condition linked with a reduced level of serotonin in your brain
Depression can often manifest in a person through reduced energy levels or repeated negative emotions. If you experience symptoms of depression it is important to a psychiatrist or a psychologist.
You can read more about depression here:
